member.name: GetArrayBasicsAsync(String,RequestContext)
member.remarks:
Manage your pets. You can delete or get the Pet from pet store.
Below is the JSON schema for the response payload.
Response Body:
Schema for Pet: { name: string, # Required. tag: string, # Optional. age: number, # Required. }
